resources.string:
2015.03.12:
 · Fix: Searches not returning coordinates for premium members
 · Fix: Images from short description not shown in image gallery
 · Fix: Smilies in waypoint descriptions not shown
 
 
 2015.02.23:
 · Fix: Home location not parsed correctly
 · Fix: Crash exporting GPX for lab caches
 · Fix: Crash restoring non-existing database backup
 · Fix: Spoiler photo from hint not always downloaded
 · Fix: Bad sort order for filter names in some languages
 · Fix: Crash searching maps on broken file system
 
 
 2015.01.20:
 · Fix: Nearby search for basic members not working in some cases
 · Fix: On change of OSM map it was not centered to the current location
 · Fix: Better handling for caches with high amount of pictures
 · Fix: Rare crash if TB can not be found
 · Fix: Possible crash in case GooglePlay location services are not working as expected
 · Fictitious: This app will auto-solve all Mysterys
 
 
 2015.01.12:
 · New: Waypoints created from personal notes can now be deleted
 · New: More easy to use GCVote dialog in cache details
 · New: Add system information in "About" page and support mails
 · New: Improved NFC handling and support retrieval of cache and trackable URLs via NFC
 · New: Use alternate source to display the location on homescreen if Google fails
 · New: Improve refresh speed by skipping static map loading if download limit is reached
 · New: Live map will now open at last position if follow function is not active
 · Fix: Arrow on map not shown on some devices
 · Fix: Compass working erratically on some devices
 · Fix: Batch refresh of caches without progress
 · Fix: Cache logs and pictures could be mixed up after batch refresh
 · Fix: Major rework of spanish translation
 · Fix: Menu for scanning trackable and geocache codes wrongly hidden
 · Fix: Up navigation did not work when c:geo was invoked from another app
 · Fix: Rare crash when performing a backup of the cache database
 · Fix: Rare crash when refreshing cache lists
 · Fix: Use phone language instead of country when requesting opencaching data
 · Fix: Recognize Sygic voucher edition
 · Fix: Update locally stored GCVote when sending over network
 · Fix: Clearing of a cache only attribute is not recorded into the database
 · Fix: Improve usability by lowering timeout for network requests
 
 
 Known Limitations/Bugs:
 · Device menu button not working on map popup
 Please use the three dot button instead
 · Live map:
 Approximated coords due to limitations on the GC-website
 Be aware: If navigation is started directly from live map it may also use the approximated coords!
 In fast mode the cache type might be wrong in rare cases
 On low zoom owned/found caches may not be hidden anymore
